shows.title: ET Abductions & Past Lives / Marian Prophecies
shows.first_half: First Half: Hypnotherapist and past life regressionist Regan Forston joins Connie Willis (info) to delve into accounts from his clients, who are increasingly coming in with alien abduction encounters, as well as discovering past life incarnations of being an alien or even Bigfoot.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Renowned psychic and clairvoyant LaMont Hamilton will discuss Marian prophecies and how he survived cancer after experiencing visitations from the Mother Mary.

shows.title: Brain Potentials / Spirit Communications
shows.first_half: First Half: Neil Slade is an author delving into brain function and behavior. He'll share his latest research and the new findings in the realm of neuroscience that puts a different spin on what we know about brain potential. He'll also speak about the brain's correlation to music.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Remote viewer and spirit communicator Mercedez Lucke-Benedict will discuss her life journey, including a car accident that changed her life and left her with spiritual abilities. She'll also tell us about the haunted land she lives on, and the spirits that inhabit it.

shows.title: Ancient Biblical Research / Lucid Dreaming
shows.first_half: First Half: Prof. Ken Hanson will present his latest research on the mystical fringe of ancient Judaism and discuss new AI-based dating of the Dead Sea Scrolls, which could rewrite biblical history, and will answer questions such as whether the ‘angels’ of Enoch were really extraterrestrial visitors.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and journalist Von Braschler has written more than a dozen books on consciousness development, time travel, dreams, and out-of-body projection. He'll delve into the many aspects of dreams, including their meanings, how they affect our lives, and how to program, map, and launch a lucid dream.

shows.title: Tech Advancements / Spiritual Warfare
shows.first_half: First Half: Author, writer, and researcher Charles Shults III will discuss technical advancements in neural input, repairing eyesight, expanded sensory input, and the ability to detect signs of life in unusual environments.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Director and writer Arthur A. Anderson speaks about the critical battle of spiritual warfare that he believes affects every aspect of our lives, from our mental and emotional health to our relationships and well-being. He'll draw from over a decade and a half of personal experience and research to explore how this invisible war is fought between the kingdom of God and the kingdom of Satan.

shows.title: Moon Missions / 'Conjuring' House Haunting
shows.first_half: First Half: Prof. Jim Bell will discuss the upcoming anniversary of the historic Apollo 11 Moon landing back in 1969, as well as major highlights from the rest of the Apollo Moon landing missions. He'll also outline the future astronaut exploration of the Moon in NASA’s Artemis program and the plans of other nations.
shows.second_half: Second Half: On July 19th, 2013, the movie The Conjuring was released. Andrea Perron is the eldest daughter of the Perron family whose experiences at their Rhode Island house inspired the film. She'll recall her family’s paranormal encounters, and the help they received from investigators Ed & Lorraine Warren.

shows.title: Open Lines
shows.first_half: Give guest host Rich Berra (email) a call and discuss whatever is on your mind!
